duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the day-to-day operations of the event, ensuring all aspects run smoothly.
Review, assist in the preparation of, and manage contracts, deal memos, and agreements related to the event.
Help with the onboarding and management of payroll for event staff and contractors.
Support logistics planning and execution, including transportation, accommodations, and equipment.
Collaborate with vendors and suppliers to ensure their timely and efficient participation in the event.
Work closely with the production team and other departments to ensure seamless coordination.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Event Management, Business, or a related field
